But the answer to the question what would you most like to see changed about the regime could be boiled down to two words: Zahi Hawass . ,'' Eric Schmidt said in a prepared statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.'' Twitter comment on the shuffle was less formal: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!, he wrote. The surprise move shocked the tech industry. Eric Schmidt , Page and Brin have long run Google as a trio, an approach they spelled out in an`` owner's manual'' included in the

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
